TextLibrary.Text: Minogoth
What tiny creature is this that disturbs the mighty Minogoth?
What tiny creature is this that disturbs the mighty Minogoth?
What tiny creature is this that disturbs the mighty Minogoth?
What tiny creature is this that disturbs the mighty Minogoth?
I've come for the Skull of Sartek. Give it to me and we will leave in peace.
I've come for the Skull of Sartek. Give it to me and we will leave in peace.
I've come for the Skull of Sartek. Give it to me and we will leave in peace.
I've come for the Skull of Sartek. Give it to me and we will leave in peace.
Ah! You are one of the slave races. I have already eaten three of you today. I do not want another.
Ah! You are one of the slave races. I have already eaten three of you today. I do not want another.
Ah! You are one of the slave races. I have already eaten three of you today. I do not want another.
Ah! You are one of the slave races. I have already eaten three of you today. I do not want another.
You know where the slaves are being taken? Tell me!
You know where the slaves are being taken? Tell me!
You know where the slaves are being taken? Tell me!
You know where the slaves are being taken? Tell me!
I will do better than that. After I have defeated you, I will SEND you there!
